vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
καρποφορ-έω,
bear fruit, [NT+5th c.BC+]:—middle, [NT]:—passive, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to produce a crop, bear fruit
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to produce a crop, bear fruit
to bear fruit, yield, Mk. 4:28; met, to bring forth the fruit of action or conduct, Mt. 13:23; Rom. 7:5; middle to expand by fruitfulness, to develop itself by success, Col. 1:6, 10
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 結果子, 出作物 (可 4:28)
2) (內在的生命) 結出, 產生
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 结果子, 出作物 (可 4:28)
2) (内在的生命) 结出, 产生
